= HQDM_class_of_individual

//Include information from owl files

The following model provides an overview of :HQDM_class_of_individual

image::./images/{diagram_x}.png[alternative text]

include::xx_yy_zz.adoc[]

|===
|Element |Description

|Type
|owl:Class

|Name
|HQDM_class_of_individual

|IRI
|http://ontology.asam.net/ontologies/OpenXOntologyHQDM.owl#HQDM_class_of_individual

|Subclass of
|:HQDM_class_of_state

|Comment
|A class_of_state that is individual or any of its subsets.
Note: Only classes that necessarily apply to an individual for the whole of its life are valid members. Others are members of class_of_state and apply to the state that is the individual for the period of time that the class applies for.

|===
